title: Morning Meditation
description: Start your day with 10 minutes of mindfulness meditation to reduce stress and improve focus.

title: Gratitude Journaling
description: Write down three things you're grateful for to cultivate a positive mindset.

title: Evening Walk
description: Take a 30-minute walk every evening to unwind and stay active.

title: Hydration Check-In
description: Track your water intake to stay energized and healthy.

title: Read 10 Pages
description: Feed your brain by reading 10 pages of a book daily.

title: Digital Detox
description: Disconnect from screens for a full day to recharge mentally.

title: Stretch Routine
description: Start your day with a 10-minute full body stretch for flexibility.

title: Meal Prep Sunday
description: Plan and prepare your meals for the week to stay on track with nutrition.

title: Cold Shower Challenge
description: Take a cold shower to boost alertness, mood, and resilience.
